name: Boba Dating Simulator????
description:
Haven't you ever wanted to date boba?

No? Neither does our main character, Easter Holiday! 

Boba Dating Simulator is a choice-based visual novel.  It takes around 15 minutes to play! You should play it! Go!! Go now! Play the game and tell us how it is!

WAYS TO PLAY

  • IN BROWSER:  Play the game here in browser!!! Click here! So easy!

Click on the link above! The game will start as soon as you open the link. 

  • DOWNLOAD:

Click on the "Bobadate" file in the folder and extract all. From there you can click the BobaDate application when it has a little box icon. It may get blocked by your computer's antivirus, just click to let it run.

 If you don't have Windows, that sucks (you can just play the browser version).

Background and end screen credits: Miles Lee (@moralitycalls on instagram)

Music credits: Louie Zong

Easter's theme:  'seaside temple'

Unnamed Employee theme: "A Worm  Welcome"

Mango's theme: "Cats and Dogs"

Taro's theme: "Office Pothos Lament"

Matcha's Theme: "Charlie Brown's Day Off"
